sense.def:
A denial of something
je izjava, da nekaj ni resnično, na primer obtožba.

seg.quote: He made a personal denial of all the charges against him.

sense.def:
Denial of something
pomeni, da ljudem ni dovoljeno, da bi imeli nekaj, do česar imajo po njihovem mnenju pravico.

seg.quote: They protested against the continued denial of civil liberties.
